data.title: Nick Zano Dishes on Double Dating with Hilary Duff & Mike Comrie
data.meta_description: Hilary Duff, 23, and her older sister have always been close, spending a lot of time together building their acting careers from a young age and teaming up on
data.text:
OK! NEWS: HILARY DUFF VISITS A CHICAGO ELEMENTARY SCHOOL FOR BLESSINGS IN A BACKPACK

Nick explained that the sisters balance each other out perfectly as, “Haylie cooks everything. She is an amazing cook and Hilary is an amazing baker.”

And the family bonding doesn’t just stop in the kitchen! Hilary’s NHL pro hubby Mike Comrie, who plays for the Pittsburgh Penguins, has been chumming up to Nick, teaching the once uninformed New Jersey native a thing or two about hockey.

OK! NEWS: HILARY DUFF'S BOYFRIEND AIMS TO PLEASE

“Mike taught me so much about hockey. I was never a hockey guy,” the 33-year-old explained to OK! at Bar Marmont while sipping on a Heineken, “ He opened my eyes to hockey and I became a fan. I went to several Pittsburgh games.”

While Nick kept mum on the possibility of one day becoming Hilary’s brother-in-law, he definitely seems devoted to Haylie for the time being, marriage aside.

OK! NEWS: HILARY DUFF STEPS OUT IN PARIS

“I think to love somebody everyday for a long period of time is the most romantic thing you can do,” the Final Destination actor gushed to reporters of his girlfriend.

Nick and Haylie, 26, met while filming My Sexiest Year in 2007, the same year that Hilary began dating her how husband Mike.

OK! NEWS: HILARY DUFF GOES OVERSEAS TO PROMOTE HER NEW BOOK

Ten Year, Nick's latest project also starring Channing Tatum, Kate Mara, Rosario Dawson, Jenna Dewan, and Justin Long, is set for release at the end of this year.
